description.en:
Comedy, mystery, horror, youth adventure, and more! A collection of 9 fantastic Umezawa Shun oneshots published in Young Sunday that will pierce your chest through the ages!

Now with author commentaries and a new 13-page 10th oneshot!

**Chapters:**
1. Days Having Served Queen Naomi (Naomi-joousama ni Tsukaeta Hibi)
A heart-warming story depicting the days of an enslaved boy and his queen.
2. Matching (Osoro)
3. The Molester Train Is Full Of Danger (Chikan Ressha wa Kiken ga Ippai)
4. Tube (Tube)
When a man wakes up from a 12-year vegetative state, the world has somehow gone in a strange direction…? A sharp satire of today's warning-heavy society.
5. The Speed To Shake Off Sentimentality (Sentimental o Furikiru Speed)
6. Linked World (Tsunagatta Sekai)
7. Hate Virus (Hate Virus)
8. Dotsuki Dotsukarete Ikiru no sa (Zenpen)
9. Dotsuki Dotsukarete Ikiru no sa (Kouhen)
10. For Whom Do Turtles Exist (Ta ga Tame ni Kame wa Aru)
11. **Exclusive to the Political Correctness Edition:** What I Want to Convey As Someone With Orbis Tertius Syndrome (Orbis · Tertius Shokougun no Boku ga Tsutaetai Koto)
